Smart Hanky - A smart hanky that can detect and monitor your health conditions such as temperature, blood pressure, and blood oxygen levels. It can also detect when you are feeling stressed or anxious and provide calming breathing exercises and guided meditation to help you relax. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

StyleHank - A fashionable hanky that can change its design and color based on your mood and outfit. It can also act as a personal stylist by suggesting matching accessories and outfits based on your preferences. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

HankyTalk - A hanky that can translate languages in real-time, allowing you to communicate with people from different cultures and backgrounds. It can also provide cultural insights and tips on how to communicate effectively in different situations. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

EcoHanky - An eco-friendly hanky made from recycled materials that can purify the air around you. It can also detect when you are feeling unwell and provide you with natural remedies and breathing exercises to help you feel better. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

MindfulHanky - A hanky that can help you meditate and practice mindfulness. It can provide guided meditation sessions, breathing exercises, and mental wellness tips to help you stay focused and relaxed throughout the day. (Confidence Score: 0.9)
